description:
Rubette has accidentally turned herself into cannot speak, and she`s having no luck communicating her plight to Gokudo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Las hermanas demonio, un encuentro entre lágrimas.
Osorubeki Youkai Shimai Namida no Saikai! no Koto
Temptation of the Deadly Gorgeous Sisters!
おそるべき妖怪姉妹涙の再会! のこと
